name: Peas Save Me
description:
Peas Save Me

Arcade adventure game. Avoid the cutlery and liquids as you navigate around the plate to rescue your fellow pea mates from their fate. 

Use the growth powerup to double your size to stay alive! 

Music - Bosca Ceoil, SFX - BFXR

Art - MagicaVoxel

Controls

Move - arrows/WASD

Esc - Pause Game

If you find a bug or get stuck in game - Press Q
